changes.description: Massive Vortex update with performance upgrades, new systems, and fun activities!
changes.title: VORTEX 2.1

changes.description: Big optimization pass on all clothing to help with performance and reduce overall city lag. Duplicates removed and optimized clothing is now under 'textures/'.
changes.title: CLOTHING UPDATE 2.5

changes.description: MLOs and vehicles tuned and optimized for better performance across the city.
changes.title: MLO & VEHICLE OPTIMIZATION

changes.description: Realistic EMS system with limb-based injury logic, new ragdoll mechanics for running/falling/jumping, and different healing tools for civilians and police.
changes.title: NEW AMBULANCE SYSTEM

changes.description: Painkillers (for civilians) and IFAKs (for police) can now be used to stop bleeding and stabilize injuries.
changes.title: INJURY SYSTEM + HEALING ITEMS

changes.description: Fully redesigned notification system to better match the custom Vortex UI style.
changes.title: NOTIFICATION SYSTEM

changes.description: Progress bars have been completely redesigned to better align with the Vortex look and feel.
changes.title: PROGRESS BAR SYSTEM

changes.description: New animated loading screen with immersive visual design customized for Vortex.
changes.title: LOADING SCREEN

changes.description: New custom pause menu designed to fit the theme and layout of Vortex.
changes.title: PAUSE MENU

changes.description: New in-vehicle CarPlay radio system optimized for performance and ease of use.
changes.title: CARPLAY SYSTEM

changes.description: New radio system added with realistic radio animations for better immersion.
changes.title: RADIO SYSTEM

changes.description: Weapons now visibly stay on your back while reloading skins, driving, or switching weapons.
changes.title: WEAPON ON BACK SYSTEM

changes.description: Vehicle contracts now handled at PDM to avoid scams when selling cars.
changes.title: VEHICLE SELLING CONTRACTS

changes.description: New optimized vehicle key system that works reliably across all vehicle types.
changes.title: VEHICLE KEY SYSTEM

changes.description: New hospital interior now located in Vinewood, offering improved performance and layout.
changes.title: NEW VINEWOOD HOSPITAL

changes.description: Business crafting system and boss menu have been streamlined for better ease of use for business owners.
changes.title: BUSINESS CRAFTING/BOSS MENU

changes.description: New car derby event added at Postal 910 for fun competitive events.
changes.title: VORTEX DERBY

changes.description: Laser tag system added at Postal 622  play competitive matches with friends using laser gear.
changes.title: LASER TAG SYSTEM

players.description: The Butts Crime Family has dominated the streets this month with strategic takeovers, relentless turf control, and a reputation that leaves their enemies second-guessing every move. Feared, respected, and always a step ahead  they have earned their spot at the top.
players.name: Butts Crime Family

players.description: Agent Brownie has set the standard this month with sharp investigative work, unmatched professionalism, and relentless pursuit of justice. From undercover ops to high-stakes busts, he's proven why he's a key player in the FBI and more than earned his spot as Police Officer of the Month.
players.name: Brownie

players.description: Maximo has gone above and beyond this month, showing unwavering dedication to saving lives across the city. His leadership, professionalism, and quick response in high-pressure situations have earned him the title of EMS Employee of the Month  and with his promotion to Chief of EMS, the department is in capable hands.
players.name: Maximo

store.description: Check out exclusive in-game packages designed to level up your experience while helping support the continued growth and quality of VORTEX Roleplay
store.title: VORTEX STORE
